analyzed: de bas na tshig la tshig 'di las rnam par gzhag pa med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no other arrangement of words than these words.

original: de bas na 'dir kha na ma tho ba ma yin pa chad pa la pham pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to ;
analyzed: de bas na 'dir kha na ma tho ba ma yin pa chad pa la pham pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to ;
translated: Therefore, here, there is no defeat in the penalty for what is not an offense. This is the meaning.

original: / gal te 'di yod ces bsams pa rnams la ma bstan pa yang bdag ces bya ba la sogs pa'i sgras nye bar bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: / gal te 'di yod ces bsams pa rnams la ma bstan pa yang bdag ces bya ba la sogs pa'i sgras nye bar bsdu ba'o //
translated: If it is thought that this exists, and if it is not taught, then it is included by the words self and so on.

original: 'di ni bdag nyid ces bya ba la sogs par 'gyur na de'i tshe na yang gzhan la sbyor zhing zhes bya ba ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ni bdag nyid ces bya ba la sogs par 'gyur na de'i tshe na yang gzhan la sbyor zhing zhes bya ba ci zhig bya zhe na /
translated: If it were to become this is my self and so on, then at that time, what would be the point of connecting it to another?

original: de'i phyir nye bar sbyor na ma yin no zhes bya ba @105a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir nye bar sbyor na ma yin no zhes bya ba @105a * //
translated: Therefore, it is said, It is not connected.

original: smos te ; rang la zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: smos te ; rang la zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: To itself is to be supplied.

original: dge slong 'di yod de gang zhig lha rnams mthong zhes bya ba 'di la gal te rang gi ston pa'i sgra la bdag nyid 'di yin zhes bya ba bsam par byed na de bas na gzhan gyi bstan pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: dge slong 'di yod de gang zhig lha rnams mthong zhes bya ba 'di la gal te rang gi ston pa'i sgra la bdag nyid 'di yin zhes bya ba bsam par byed na de bas na gzhan gyi bstan pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: In this Is there a monk who sees the gods? if it is thought that the word self refers to one's own teacher, then it is not the teaching of another.

original: rang bstan pa nyid kyis der ltung ba yong su rdzogs pa nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang bstan pa nyid kyis der ltung ba yong su rdzogs pa nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the statement “one falls into that” is that one completely falls into that.

original: de ltar yang gi gzhung ni 'di skad ces nga nyid do zhes mi smra na zhes bya ba yin no //🔽ma bsams par bstan par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni ji ltar bslu ba'i blos yid ches dang bral ba'i tshig gis glags mi rnyed de bzhin du /
analyzed: de ltar yang gi gzhung ni 'di skad ces nga nyid do zhes mi smra na zhes bya ba yin no // ma bsams par bstan par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni ji ltar bslu ba'i blos yid ches dang bral ba'i tshig gis glags mi rnyed de bzhin du /
translated: The meaning of the statement “one does not say ‘I am that’ ” is that one does not say “I am that” in the scriptures.🔽The meaning of the statement “one does not teach without having reflected” is that one does not teach without having reflected, as if one were a liar, with words that lack conviction.

original: so sor brtags pa ma byas par lung bstan par mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don te //
analyzed: so sor brtags pa ma byas par lung bstan par mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don te //
translated: The meaning of the statement “one does not prophesy without having investigated” is that one does not prophesy without having investigated, as if one were a fool.

original: pham par 'gyur ba bzhi pa rnam par 'byed pa'i skabs so /
analyzed: pham par 'gyur ba bzhi pa rnam par 'byed pa'i skabs so /
translated: This concludes the section on the fourth downfall.

original: // / bla ma thob pa yongs su nyams pa go bar byed pa ni ma brjod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid dman pa ste /
analyzed: // / bla ma thob pa yongs su nyams pa go bar byed pa ni ma brjod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid dman pa ste /
translated: The meaning of the statement “the loss of the attainment of the guru is not to be understood” is that one does not understand the loss of the attainment of the guru, as if one were inferior.

original: bdag ni dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi las nyams pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas thob pa las yong su nyams pa las bstan pa gang yin pa de yang mi'i chos bla ma ma brjod pa ma yin te brjod pa kho na nyid yin pas /
analyzed: bdag ni dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi las nyams pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas thob pa las yong su nyams pa las bstan pa gang yin pa de yang mi'i chos bla ma ma brjod pa ma yin te brjod pa kho na nyid yin pas /
translated: The statement I have degenerated from the four fruits of virtuous endeavor and so on, is not a statement of a supramundane quality, but rather a statement of degeneration from attainment.

original: 'dir gal te brdzun du smra ba nyid yod par gyur pa pa pham par mi 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir gal te brdzun du smra ba nyid yod par gyur pa pa pham par mi 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: If lying exists, then one does not commit a defeat.

original: pham par 'gyur ba kho na yin no //
analyzed: pham par 'gyur ba kho na yin no //
translated: One definitely commits a defeat.

original: ma thob pa la nyams pa gang zhes bstan pa de gal te skyon dang bcas na khyad par su zhig srid pa'i 'dun pas yang dag par mtshon pa nyid de la rig par bya'o //
analyzed: ma thob pa la nyams pa gang zhes bstan pa de gal te skyon dang bcas na khyad par su zhig srid pa'i 'dun pas yang dag par mtshon pa nyid de la rig par bya'o //
translated: If the statement, “I have degenerated from what has not been obtained,” is faulty, then one should understand that it is a statement of a specific person who is inclined to existence.

original: slar gang zhig skyon dang bral ba de la skyon dang bral ba nyid do //
analyzed: slar gang zhig skyon dang bral ba de la skyon dang bral ba nyid do //
translated: If it is free of fault, then it is free of fault.

original: bla ma brjod pa'i 'dun pas ming mthun pa'i don brjod na sbom pa'o zhes bya ba ni ming 'dra ba don brjod pa ni ming dang mthun pa'i don brjod pa'o //
analyzed: bla ma brjod pa'i 'dun pas ming mthun pa'i don brjod na sbom pa'o zhes bya ba ni ming 'dra ba don brjod pa ni ming dang mthun pa'i don brjod pa'o //
translated: If one says the meaning of the name in the sense of expressing the name with the intention of expressing the guru, it is a serious offense.

original: bdag slob pa zhes bya ba so sor thar pa'i sdom pa la sogs pa la slob pa'o //
analyzed: bdag slob pa zhes bya ba so sor thar pa'i sdom pa la sogs pa la slob pa'o //
translated: Saying I am a learner means training in the prātimokṣa vows and so on.

original: bdag ni mi slob ces bya ba bstan pa dang / 'dul ba dang so sor thar pa'i mdo la sogs pa dang / chos mngon pa la sogs pa slob pa nyid dang mi brtson pa nyid lhung bzed la sogs pa las lhag ma med pa dang /
analyzed: bdag ni mi slob ces bya ba bstan pa dang / 'dul ba dang so sor thar pa'i mdo la sogs pa dang / chos mngon pa la sogs pa slob pa nyid dang mi brtson pa nyid lhung bzed la sogs pa las lhag ma med pa dang /
translated: Saying I am not a learner means not striving in the teachings, the Vinaya, the Prātimokṣa Sūtra and so on, and the Abhidharma and so on, and not having any remainder of alms bowl and so on.

original: bdag la ci'ang med do zhes bya ba skye ba'i tha ma bzlog pa nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: bdag la ci'ang med do zhes bya ba skye ba'i tha ma bzlog pa nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: Saying I have nothing at all means turning away from rebirth.

original: grur 'gro ba dag la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba bstan pa nyid der 'bras bu di la me tog la sogs pa bdag @105b nyid kyis bzung nas 'bras bu thob po zhes bya ba dang / khyod ni zag pa med do zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'dri ba'i bdag nyid la bdag la 'tsho ba la sogs pa med do zhes bya ba ni 'di 'das pa'o //🔽tsho ba'i 'jigs pa las bdag ni 'jigs pa ma yin zhes bya ba dang bdag ni kun tu sbyor ba la sogs pa las grol lo zhes bya ba'i ming dang bcas pa'i don la dgongs nas bla ma'i ming dang 'dra ba'i ming de la bla ma bstan pa'i
analyzed: grur 'gro ba dag la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba bstan pa nyid der 'bras bu di la me tog la sogs pa bdag @105b nyid kyis bzung nas 'bras bu thob po zhes bya ba dang / khyod ni zag pa med do zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'dri ba'i bdag nyid la bdag la 'tsho ba la sogs pa med do zhes bya ba ni 'di 'das pa'o // tsho ba'i 'jigs pa las bdag ni 'jigs pa ma yin zhes bya ba dang bdag ni kun tu sbyor ba la sogs pa las grol lo zhes bya ba'i ming dang bcas pa'i don la dgongs nas bla ma'i ming dang 'dra ba'i ming de la bla ma bstan pa'i
translated: For those going in a boat, the fruit called stream-enterer is taught. Having taken up that fruit with one's own flowers, etc., one says, I have attained the fruit. And with You are without outflows, etc., one asks about one's own self. I have no livelihood, etc. is this past.🔽I am not afraid of the danger of the boat, and I am liberated from the fetters, etc. are the meanings with names. With the intention of those, the teacher teaches the name that is like the name of the guru.

original: 'dun pas brjod pa la sbom po'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'dun pas brjod pa la sbom po'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is a grave offense to speak with the intention of that name that is like the name of the guru.

original: gzhan gyis thos pa la yod par 'gyur ba 'di rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyis thos pa la yod par 'gyur ba 'di rtogs par bya'o //
translated: This should be understood to exist for one who is heard by others.

original: nor na yang ngo zhes bya ba ni brjod pa zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: nor na yang ngo zhes bya ba ni brjod pa zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: And if one errs, it is a serious offense.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sogs pa mi bden pa mi'i chos bla ma brjod par bya'o snyam pa las nor te lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sogs pa gong ma dag brjod na sbom por 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽gzhogs smos kyang ngo zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sogs pa mi bden pa mi'i chos bla ma brjod par bya'o snyam pa las nor te lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sogs pa gong ma dag brjod na sbom por 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // gzhogs smos kyang ngo zhes bya ba la /
translated: One should say, “I have attained the fruit of stream-entry,” etc., but if one says, “I have attained the higher fruits of once-returner, etc.,” it is a serious offense.🔽It is also a serious offense if one boasts indirectly.

original: yang gi sgras ni sbom po zhes bsnyag pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: yang gi sgras ni sbom po zhes bsnyag pa'i don du'o //
translated: The word “also” in the verse indicates that it is a serious offense.

original: ae ma'o khyod kho bo ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ae ma'o khyod kho bo ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
translated: “Oh, I will become just like you!”🔽“You and I and we have become stream-enterers, once-returners, non-returners, and worthy ones.”

original: kho bo dang khyod dang 'u cag 'di ltar rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa rnams su gyur cig / bdag ni rgyun du zhugs pa ma yin pa nas ji srid du dgra bcom pa'i bar yang ma yin no zhes de skad du zer zhing /
analyzed: kho bo dang khyod dang 'u cag 'di ltar rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa rnams su gyur cig / bdag ni rgyun du zhugs pa ma yin pa nas ji srid du dgra bcom pa'i bar yang ma yin no zhes de skad du zer zhing /
translated: “I am not a stream-enterer, etc., up to I am not a worthy one.”

original: gang gi phyir bdag ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa yin no zhes su zer zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir bdag ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa yin no zhes su zer zhes bya ba'o //
translated: For what reason do you say, I am a stream-enterer, once-returner, non-returner, or arhat?

original: bag ni deng nas 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan las snyoms par zhugs pa ma yin te khar rtsang ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bag ni deng nas 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan las snyoms par zhugs pa ma yin te khar rtsang ni ma yin no //
translated: I am not now entering into meditative concentration on the worldly meditations, nor was I yesterday.

original: de bas gzhan pas kyang dus gcig gi tshe na lang ma yin no //🔽chur shog 'bras bu rnams la lung bstan par bgyi'o //
analyzed: de bas gzhan pas kyang dus gcig gi tshe na lang ma yin no // chur shog 'bras bu rnams la lung bstan par bgyi'o //
translated: Therefore, I am not a cow at one time, nor am I a cow at another time.🔽Come to the water, I will prophesy about the fruits.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la lung bstan par 'gyur bar bgyi ste /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la lung bstan par 'gyur bar bgyi ste /
translated: I will prophesy about the fruit of stream-entry.

original: bdag ni rgyun du zhugs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa la mthar byed pa bla ma mtshon pa gzhan gyis thos bzhin pa las sbom po zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bdag ni rgyun du zhugs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa la mthar byed pa bla ma mtshon pa gzhan gyis thos bzhin pa las sbom po zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: I am not a stream-enterer, and so on. In such cases, the meaning of the word grave is indicated by another word that is similar in meaning but has a different ending.

original: yang dag par phyi ma nyid de mi 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: yang dag par phyi ma nyid de mi 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: It is not that it is not so in reality.

original: yang dag pa ni bden pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa ni bden pa'o //
translated: The correct is the true.

original: phyi ma'i gang la yod pa zhes bya ba'i bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: phyi ma'i gang la yod pa zhes bya ba'i bsdu ba'o //
translated: The following is a summary:

original: bden pa'i don can gzhan ma grol ba la snga ma'i @106a * //
analyzed: bden pa'i don can gzhan ma grol ba la snga ma'i @106a * //
translated: The meaning of truth is not liberation for others.

original: chig la gzhogs smos ma byas pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: chig la gzhogs smos ma byas pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: In the previous verse, the side is not mentioned.

original: gang gi phyir ma byas pa nyid ni byas pa'i don ji ltar yang rtogs par bzod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir ma byas pa nyid ni byas pa'i don ji ltar yang rtogs par bzod pa ma yin no //
translated: Because the unmade is not able to understand the meaning of the made in any way.

original: 'dir gzhung ni /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni /
translated: Here is the text:

original: btsun pa dge slong 'di skad ces slong mo ster ba'i khyim che ge mo dge slong gang gi yin pa'i dge slong de ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa'o //
analyzed: btsun pa dge slong 'di skad ces slong mo ster ba'i khyim che ge mo dge slong gang gi yin pa'i dge slong de ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa'o //
translated: Venerable, this monk says, In such and such a house that gives alms, the monk to whom it belongs is a stream-enterer, once-returner, non-returner, or arhat.

original: rigs de su zhig gis te de ni bsod snyoms pa'i rigs so //
analyzed: rigs de su zhig gis te de ni bsod snyoms pa'i rigs so //
translated: Whose family is it? It is the family of the alms-giver.

original: des smras pa /
analyzed: des smras pa /
translated: He said:

original: kho bo'i ste kho bo ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa ma yin zhes mchi na ltung ba cir 'gyur ;
analyzed: kho bo'i ste kho bo ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa ma yin zhes mchi na ltung ba cir 'gyur ;
translated: If I say, I am not a stream-enterer, once-returner, non-returner, or arhat, what is the offense?

original: nyes pa sbom por ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: nyes pa sbom por ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: It is said to be a serious offense.

original: pham pa bzhi pa las nye ba 'khor gyi zhus pa'o /
analyzed: pham pa bzhi pa las nye ba 'khor gyi zhus pa'o /
translated: This is the questioning of Upāli on the fourth defeating offense.

original: // / sbom po ni btsun pa ni dgra bcom pa chos gos la sogs pa mchog 'os pa bram ze sdig pa'i chos bsal ba btsun pa'i dbang po drug po dag ni shin tu dul ba sbas pa /
analyzed: // / sbom po ni btsun pa ni dgra bcom pa chos gos la sogs pa mchog 'os pa bram ze sdig pa'i chos bsal ba btsun pa'i dbang po drug po dag ni shin tu dul ba sbas pa /
translated: The serious offense is if one remains silent and agrees when a monk says, Venerable, you are an arhat, worthy of the best robes and so on, a brahmin who has eliminated evil dharmas, a venerable one with the six senses completely subdued, concealed,🔽protected, and cultivated.

original: bsrungs pa / bsgoms pa dag yin no zhes zer ba la cang mi smra bas dang du len par byed na'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bsrungs pa / bsgoms pa dag yin no zhes zer ba la cang mi smra bas dang du len par byed na'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: If one remains silent and agrees, it is said to be a serious offense.

original: yang dag par zhugs pa ni yid la dang du len pa brjod yang don 'di bsgrub pa ste /
analyzed: yang dag par zhugs pa ni yid la dang du len pa brjod yang don 'di bsgrub pa ste /
translated: The correct approach is to accept it in the mind, but not in reality.

original: de bas na cang mi smra ba'i ngo bo zhes bya ba ni bye brag go //
analyzed: de bas na cang mi smra ba'i ngo bo zhes bya ba ni bye brag go //
translated: Therefore, remaining silent is a specific term.

original: 'dir cang mi smra ba nyid la rnam par rig byed kyis rnam pa nyid bsgrub pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dir cang mi smra ba nyid la rnam par rig byed kyis rnam pa nyid bsgrub pa yin te /
translated: Here, the very silence itself is the proof of the intimation.

original: de bas na kha cig rnams la rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na kha cig rnams la rtogs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, some understand.

original: de bas na 'dir skyon 'di dang du blangs pa gzhan gyis rtogs pa yod par 'gyur ba la 'di sbom po'o //
analyzed: de bas na 'dir skyon 'di dang du blangs pa gzhan gyis rtogs pa yod par 'gyur ba la 'di sbom po'o //
translated: Therefore, here, the fault is gross for one who understands that there is another who accepts this.

original: gzhan du ni 'di lta bu na smad pa zhes bya ba rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan du ni 'di lta bu na smad pa zhes bya ba rig par bya'o //
translated: Otherwise, it should be understood that this is a censure.🔽If you are an arhat, then take my alms, enter my house, sit on my seat, and hold my hand.🔽Take and eat my food, soup, and solid food.🔽Rejoice!

original: btsun pa gal te dgra bcom pa yin na bdag gi bsod snyoms long shig khyim du zhugs shig stan la 'dug shig lag chu bzed cig / bza' ba dang sran tshod dang bca' ba long la zo shig / rjes su yi rang bar byos shig / byung shig
analyzed: btsun pa gal te dgra bcom pa yin na bdag gi bsod snyoms long shig khyim du zhugs shig stan la 'dug shig lag chu bzed cig / bza' ba dang sran tshod dang bca' ba long la zo shig / rjes su yi rang bar byos shig / byung shig
translated: Go!🔽If one does as he says, then it is so.

original: ces zer ba la de bzhin du bsgrub na'o zhes bya ba ni so sor 'dir brjod pa zhes bya ba'i tshig la /
analyzed: ces zer ba la de bzhin du bsgrub na'o zhes bya ba ni so sor 'dir brjod pa zhes bya ba'i tshig la /
translated: This is the expression of each one here.

original: btsun pa gal te dgra bcom pa yin na zhes bya ba 'di long shig ces bya ba rnams la bsgyur bar bya'o //
analyzed: btsun pa gal te dgra bcom pa yin na zhes bya ba 'di long shig ces bya ba rnams la bsgyur bar bya'o //
translated: The words Venerable, if you are an arhat... should be changed to Venerable, if you are an arhat....

original: bza' ba dang sran tshod ces bya ba ni long shig ces bya ba 'di gnyis ka yang sbyar te de bzhin du bsgrub na'o zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bza' ba dang sran tshod ces bya ba ni long shig ces bya ba 'di gnyis ka yang sbyar te de bzhin du bsgrub na'o zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The words food and porridge should be applied to both take and if you accomplish it like this.

original: ji skad du gsungs pa de ltar bsgrub pa la @106b btsun pa gal te dgra bcom pa yin na bdag nyid bsod snyoms long shig ces zer ba la de bzhin du bsgrub pa la bsod snyoms len par byed na sbom pa'o //
analyzed: ji skad du gsungs pa de ltar bsgrub pa la @106b btsun pa gal te dgra bcom pa yin na bdag nyid bsod snyoms long shig ces zer ba la de bzhin du bsgrub pa la bsod snyoms len par byed na sbom pa'o //
translated: If one accomplishes it as stated, if one says to the one who says, Venerable, if you are an arhat, take alms yourself, and if one takes alms in that way, it is a sthūlātyaya.

original: gzhan du na yang ji ltar rigs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan du na yang ji ltar rigs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Otherwise, it means as is appropriate.

original: btsun pa gal te dgra bcom pa yin na rjes su yi rang bar mdzod cig ces zer ba la cang mi smra ba'i ngo bos rjes su yi rang ba la sbom po'am 'dir tshig gis ni pham pa'o //
analyzed: btsun pa gal te dgra bcom pa yin na rjes su yi rang bar mdzod cig ces zer ba la cang mi smra ba'i ngo bos rjes su yi rang ba la sbom po'am 'dir tshig gis ni pham pa'o //
translated: If one says to the one who says, Venerable, if you are an arhat, rejoice, and if one rejoices by the aspect of silence, it is a sthūlātyaya. Here, by the words, it is a pārājika.

original: pham bar 'gyur ba bzhi pa 'dul byed kyi skabs las bla ma brjod pa'o /
analyzed: pham bar 'gyur ba bzhi pa 'dul byed kyi skabs las bla ma brjod pa'o /
translated: The fourth root downfall is stated in the context of the Vinaya.

original: // / rmi lam ni med pa dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba ni tha snyad kyi chos las yang dag par 'das pa nyid kyi phyir rmi lam gyi dngos po med pa dang 'dra ba nyid do //
analyzed: // / rmi lam ni med pa dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba ni tha snyad kyi chos las yang dag par 'das pa nyid kyi phyir rmi lam gyi dngos po med pa dang 'dra ba nyid do //
translated: A dream is like a non-existent thing. Because it is completely beyond conventional phenomena, a dream is like a non-existent thing.

original: de'i 'bras bu ni ma byas pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni rmi lam gyi 'bras bu la rmi lam gyi bdag nyid kyis sems dmigs pa'i bud med la sogs pas gang zhig byas pas khu ba 'byin pa ni bya ba'o //

analyzed: rig pa'i skyes pa med pa'i bud med dang lhan cig lam du 'gro ba la'o zhes bya ba ni slar dge slong gang skyes pa med par bud med dang lhan cig 'gro na lam du 'gro na zhes bya ba'i 'jug pa 'di la bud med ni byed pa
translated: In traveling on the road with a woman who is not a relative means that if a monk travels on the road with a woman who is not a relative, he commits an offense. In this case, the woman is the agent of the offense.

original: po nyid do //
analyzed: po nyid do //
translated: It is the nature of the Buddha.🔽

original: 'dir reg pa'i sgras ni chos ston pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi'i rjes su 'brangs nas byas pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir reg pa'i sgras ni chos ston pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi'i rjes su 'brangs nas byas pa'o //
translated: The term “touch” is used here in the sense of the bases of training that teach the Dharma.

original: rig pa dang rtsom pa'i 'dun pa la sngar nyid du skur pa 'debs pa la brten pa la ma bsgrubs pa ni 'dir skyes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rig pa dang rtsom pa'i 'dun pa la sngar nyid du skur pa 'debs pa la brten pa la ma bsgrubs pa ni 'dir skyes pa'i don to //

original: 'di ni kun nas 'gro ba'i khye'u dang dud 'gro rmongs pas kyang bsgrub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni kun nas 'gro ba'i khye'u dang dud 'gro rmongs pas kyang bsgrub pa ma yin no //

original: 'og ma gnyis la'o zhes bya ba ni 'di las 'og ma gang yin pa 'khrig pa dang ldan pa smra ba dang / bsnyen bkur bsngags pa gnyis po dag la yang 'dir byed pa po ni bud med nyid do //
analyzed: 'og ma gnyis la'o zhes bya ba ni 'di las 'og ma gang yin pa 'khrig pa dang ldan pa smra ba dang / bsnyen bkur bsngags pa gnyis po dag la yang 'dir byed pa po ni bud med nyid do //
translated: The two below are in the two below this, meaning that in the two below this, the one who engages in sexual intercourse and the one who praises service, the agent is also a woman.

original: khyim pa mo la ston pa la'o zhes bya ba ni khyim pa mo la tshig drug gam lnga las lhag par chos 'chad pa'i ltung byed la yang byed pa po nyid du bud med do //
analyzed: khyim pa mo la ston pa la'o zhes bya ba ni khyim pa mo la tshig drug gam lnga las lhag par chos 'chad pa'i ltung byed la yang byed pa po nyid du bud med do //
translated: The one who teaches a laywoman is in the one who teaches a laywoman more than six or five words of Dharma.

original: de ltar rab tu byung ba la slob mar gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ltung ba mi skyed pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar rab tu byung ba la slob mar gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ltung ba mi skyed pa'o //
translated: Thus, because she is a disciple in the sense of being a renunciate, she does not generate a downfall.

original: phyi rol gyi rab tu byung ba mo la ni nyes byas nyid do //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi rab tu byung ba mo la ni nyes byas nyid do //
translated: But if the external renunciate is a woman, there is only an offense of wrong conduct.

original: zhu ba'i nges par byed pa 'chad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: zhu ba'i nges par byed pa 'chad par 'gyur te /
translated: The explanation of the definitive statement of the request will be given below.

original: de bas na bud med khyim na gnas pa nyid byed pa po zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bas na bud med khyim na gnas pa nyid byed pa po zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, a woman who is a householder is the agent.

original: ci khyim pa mo la ston pa'i gnas skabs thams cad kyis byed pa po nyid du bud med yin @112a * //
analyzed: ci khyim pa mo la ston pa'i gnas skabs thams cad kyis byed pa po nyid du bud med yin @112a * //
translated: Is a woman the agent in all the circumstances of the teacher, even if she is a householder?

original: nam zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: nam zhe na ma yin te /
translated: No, she is not.

original: de'i phyir skyes pa med par ro zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir skyes pa med par ro zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Therefore, it says, “without a man.”

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: de'i phyir rig pa'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rig pa'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it says, “through knowledge.”

original: 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i brjod pa dang spyod pa dag la mngon par shes pa nyid ni 'dir rig pa nyid du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i brjod pa dang spyod pa dag la mngon par shes pa nyid ni 'dir rig pa nyid du shes par bya'o //
translated: Here, knowledge should be understood as the clear understanding of the expressions and conduct associated with sexual intercourse.

original: 'di la rig pa ma yin pa yod pa ni med pa nyid de don yod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di la rig pa ma yin pa yod pa ni med pa nyid de don yod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: She who has that knowledge is not ignorant, but she is not a man.

original: de bas na yongs su rdzogs pa nyid ni 'di dag las rig pa med par nye bar gyur pa la ston pa dang / lam du 'gro ba dag la kha na ma tho ba mi skyed de na smad pa yang ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na yongs su rdzogs pa nyid ni 'di dag las rig pa med par nye bar gyur pa la ston pa dang / lam du 'gro ba dag la kha na ma tho ba mi skyed de na smad pa yang ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not a downfall to teach the Dharma to those who are not celibate, or to go on the road with them, or to be reviled by them.

original: yod kyang mi rung ba la'o zhes bya ba ni spyar ma'i spyod pa gang dag yin pa de dag nye bar ston par byed pa ste /
analyzed: yod kyang mi rung ba la'o zhes bya ba ni spyar ma'i spyod pa gang dag yin pa de dag nye bar ston par byed pa ste /
translated: “Even if it is improper” means that if one reveals the conduct of the monastic code,

original: dngos su yod pa la ni rig pa'i skyes pa yod kyang bud med ni byed pa po yin no //
analyzed: dngos su yod pa la ni rig pa'i skyes pa yod kyang bud med ni byed pa po yin no //
translated: even if there is a celibate person present, the woman is the agent, not the monk.

original: de ni nyes byas kyi'o zhes bya ba ni dngos su gnas pa la yang mi rung ba la byed pa po nyid gang yin pa 'di nyes byas la ste dngos gzhi la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni nyes byas kyi'o zhes bya ba ni dngos su gnas pa la yang mi rung ba la byed pa po nyid gang yin pa 'di nyes byas la ste dngos gzhi la ni ma yin no //
translated: “This is a minor offense” means that the agent is at fault, not the one who is the basis of the offense.

original: 'dir gzhung ni zhu ba las /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni zhu ba las /
translated: The text of the Vinaya says:

original: bud med mi rung ba las skyes pa rung ba dang lhan cig chos ston na nyes byas so zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: bud med mi rung ba las skyes pa rung ba dang lhan cig chos ston na nyes byas so zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: “If a monk teaches the Dharma to a woman who is not a suitable candidate, he commits a minor offense.”

original: gling gzhan nas skyes pa dang 'gyur ba brten pa gnyis ni ma chog pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni byang gi sgra mi snyan la sogs pa'i gling gzhan nas skyes pa dang / lus sam ngag gis bud med kyi skabs sam skyes pa'i skabs su 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba gang gis bsten par 'gyur ba ni dper na bsnyon thabs mkhan nam ma ning lta bu de gnyis ni ston pa'i skabs 'dir rig par ma chog pa
analyzed: gling gzhan nas skyes pa dang 'gyur ba brten pa gnyis ni ma chog pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni byang gi sgra mi snyan la sogs pa'i gling gzhan nas skyes pa dang / lus sam ngag gis bud med kyi skabs sam skyes pa'i skabs su 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba gang gis bsten par 'gyur ba ni dper na bsnyon thabs mkhan nam ma ning lta bu de gnyis ni ston pa'i skabs 'dir rig par ma chog pa
translated: Those born in other continents such as Uttarakuru and those who transform their bodies or speech into the state of a woman or man and engage in sexual union with that basis are not suitable to be taught in this context.

original: nyid do // 'dir rung ba la ston pa yod par gyur pa la ni nyes byas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: nyid do // 'dir rung ba la ston pa yod par gyur pa la ni nyes byas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that if one engages in sex with a suitable partner, one commits an offense of wrong conduct.

original: mi rung ba la ni shin tu lci ba 'di'i rjes su 'brangs pas nyes byas shes par bya'o //
analyzed: mi rung ba la ni shin tu lci ba 'di'i rjes su 'brangs pas nyes byas shes par bya'o //
translated: If one engages in sex with an unsuitable partner, one should understand that it is a serious offense, following this text.

original: 'dir gzhung ni zhu ba las btsun pa dge slong gis re zhig 'dzam bu'i gling gi bud med la byang gi sgra mi snyam pa dang lhan cig chos ston na ltung ba cir 'gyur /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni zhu ba las btsun pa dge slong gis re zhig 'dzam bu'i gling gi bud med la byang gi sgra mi snyam pa dang lhan cig chos ston na ltung ba cir 'gyur /
translated: “If a fully ordained monk teaches Dharma to a woman of Jambudvīpa together with a man from Kuru in the north, what is his downfall?”

original: nyes byas so //
analyzed: nyes byas so //
translated: “It is a minor offense.”

original: de bzhin du gling gzhan pa rnams dang lhan cig chos ston pa la yang nyes byas so zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du gling gzhan pa rnams dang lhan cig chos ston pa la yang nyes byas so zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: “Similarly, if he teaches Dharma together with a man from the other continents, it is a minor offense.”🔽The Bhagavān said, “Do not teach Dharma to a woman without a male present.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis rig pa'i skyes pa med par bud med la chos bstan par mi bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa de la rig pa'i skyes pa ji lta bu zhig dang lhan cig tu bud med la chos bstan par bya zhe na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis rig pa'i skyes pa med par bud med la chos bstan par mi bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa de la rig pa'i skyes pa ji lta bu zhig dang lhan cig tu bud med la chos bstan par bya zhe na /
translated: In that case, with what kind of male present should Dharma be taught to a woman?

original: rung ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: rung ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: “With a suitable male.”

original: rung ba ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: rung ba ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: “What kind of male is suitable?”

original: smras pa / khyim pa yang rung @112b rab tu byung ba yang rung ste /
analyzed: smras pa / khyim pa yang rung @112b rab tu byung ba yang rung ste /
translated: “A suitable male is a layperson or a renunciate

original: 'gyur ba bsten par mi byed pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'gyur ba bsten par mi byed pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: who does not engage in sexual activity.”

original: rnam par 'gyur ba'i sgo 'brel ba'i don du 'dir rig pa'i skyes pa la brten pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par 'gyur ba'i sgo 'brel ba'i don du 'dir rig pa'i skyes pa la brten pa'o //
translated: In this case, the person is based on the consciousnesses, in order to connect with the door of transformation.

original: 'dir 'di dag la bdag po nyid yongs su rdzogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir 'di dag la bdag po nyid yongs su rdzogs pa ma yin te /
translated: Here, the person is not fully complete,

original: gling gzhan nas skyes pa la skye ba 'di su zhig ces bya ba yin la brten pa nyid kyi gus pa med pas /
analyzed: gling gzhan nas skyes pa la skye ba 'di su zhig ces bya ba yin la brten pa nyid kyi gus pa med pas /
translated: because when one is born in another continent, one asks, “Who is this one born here?” and because of the lack of respect for the basis.

original: de bas na 'di lhag par shes par 'gyur te /🔽'di dag la rtsom pa dang 'dun pa la sogs pa ma grub pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na 'di lhag par shes par 'gyur te / 'di dag la rtsom pa dang 'dun pa la sogs pa ma grub pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is understood that

analyzed: de bas na 'dir lam du 'gro ba yin gyi rnam par shes pa la ni ma yin no //
translated: the person is not established here in the path, but in consciousness.

original: de ni brda phrad pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni dper na go bar bya ba gzhan la go bar grub pa kho nar 'gyur gyi ma grub na ni phyed nyid yin pa de bzhin du rig pa'i skyes pa yod pa 'di la brda phrad na'o zhes bya
analyzed: de ni brda phrad pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni dper na go bar bya ba gzhan la go bar grub pa kho nar 'gyur gyi ma grub na ni phyed nyid yin pa de bzhin du rig pa'i skyes pa yod pa 'di la brda phrad na'o zhes bya
translated: “That is the mere convention” means that, for example, one is understood only when one is understood by another, but not when one is not understood. In the same way, when one has the person, one is understood by the convention.

original: ba'i don to //
analyzed: ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: chom rkun dang kla klo la sogs pa nyid kyis skad ma go ba dang gnyid log pa dang / smyos pa dang / bag med par gyur pa dang / snyoms par zhugs pa dang / glen pa dang 'on par gyur pa rnams la ston pa la rig pa'i skyes pa de la nyes byas de la 'di byed pa'o //
analyzed: chom rkun dang kla klo la sogs pa nyid kyis skad ma go ba dang gnyid log pa dang / smyos pa dang / bag med par gyur pa dang / snyoms par zhugs pa dang / glen pa dang 'on par gyur pa rnams la ston pa la rig pa'i skyes pa de la nyes byas de la 'di byed pa'o //
translated: The person who teaches the Dharma to thieves, barbarians, etc., who do not understand the language, to those who are asleep, to those who are insane, to those who are inattentive, to those who are in samādhi, to the mute, to the deaf, commits an offense, but not the one who does not teach the Dharma to them.

original: rnam pa de lta bu nyid la mtshan cig shos don med do zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu nyid la mtshan cig shos don med do zhes bya ba la /
translated: In the same way, the other sex is useless.

analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis nyid yod par gyur pa la'o //
translated: In the same way means: when the two sexes exist.

original: don med pa ni 'bras bu med pa cung zad kyang mi byed pa'o //🔽bud med nyid nyams pa la bud med kyi mtshan las gzhan ni skyes pa'i mtshan ma ste /
analyzed: don med pa ni 'bras bu med pa cung zad kyang mi byed pa'o // bud med nyid nyams pa la bud med kyi mtshan las gzhan ni skyes pa'i mtshan ma ste /
translated: Useless means: without fruit, not doing anything.🔽The male sex is useless when the female sex is damaged. The male organ is different from the female organ.

original: skyes pa'i rnam pa nyid kyang yod par gyur pa la skyes pa nyid ni don med pa ste skyes pa'i mtshan nyams pa las gzhan pa ni bud med kyi mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: skyes pa'i rnam pa nyid kyang yod par gyur pa la skyes pa nyid ni don med pa ste skyes pa'i mtshan nyams pa las gzhan pa ni bud med kyi mtshan ma'o //
translated: The male sex is useless when the male organ is damaged. The female organ is different from the male organ.

original: de bas na 'jug pa 'di rnams la dge slong la bud med kyi rnam pa'i mtshan ma byed do //
analyzed: de bas na 'jug pa 'di rnams la dge slong la bud med kyi rnam pa'i mtshan ma byed do //
translated: Therefore, in these penetrations, the female form is the sign for a fully ordained monk.

original: skyes pa'i rnam pa la yang la lar ni na smad pa'o //
analyzed: skyes pa'i rnam pa la yang la lar ni na smad pa'o //
translated: In the male form, sometimes it is the lower body.

original: 'dir gzhung ni mtshan gnyis pa la reg na gal te bud med kyi dbang du gyur pa yin na de'i tshe ni dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i ltung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni mtshan gnyis pa la reg na gal te bud med kyi dbang du gyur pa yin na de'i tshe ni dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i ltung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Here, the treatise states: “If one touches a hermaphrodite, if it is under the influence of a female, then it is a downfall of a partially concordant act with a root downfall of fully ordained monks.

original: gal te skyes pa'i dbang du gyur pa yin na ni de'i tshe nyes pa sbom po'i ltung bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te skyes pa'i dbang du gyur pa yin na ni de'i tshe nyes pa sbom po'i ltung bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: If it is under the influence of a male, then it is a serious downfall.”

original: gang zhig khyad par med par mtshan gnyis par gyur na sbom po'i ltung bar glog par gyur na de'i nyams par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gang zhig khyad par med par mtshan gnyis par gyur na sbom po'i ltung bar glog par gyur na de'i nyams par rig par bya'o //
translated: If one touches a hermaphrodite without distinction, it is a serious downfall.

original: 'dir phyed nyid byed pa yin no zhes bya ba ni mtshan cig shos mo'i mtshan gyi skabs 'dir rig pa'i skyes pa nyid kyi skyes pa dang bud med dang lhan cig tu lam du 'gro ba dang bud med la chos ston pa @113a * //🔽ni nyes byas su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽'og ma gsum la legs par smras pa dang nyes par smras pa dag gis don kun shes pa dang / gzhan la 'khrig pa bsten par bya ba'i mthu yod pa nyid yin na dngos gzhi'o zhes bya ba ni 'di las 'og ma bslab pa'i gzhi gnyis po dang ston pa gang yin pa gsum po 'di 'don pa'i rim pa las tha mar gyur pa nyid kyi phyir tha
analyzed: 'dir phyed nyid byed pa yin no zhes bya ba ni mtshan cig shos mo'i mtshan gyi skabs 'dir rig pa'i skyes pa nyid kyi skyes pa dang bud med dang lhan cig tu lam du 'gro ba dang bud med la chos ston pa @113a * // ni nyes byas su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // 'og ma gsum la legs par smras pa dang nyes par smras pa dag gis don kun shes pa dang / gzhan la 'khrig pa bsten par bya ba'i mthu yod pa nyid yin na dngos gzhi'o zhes bya ba ni 'di las 'og ma bslab pa'i gzhi gnyis po dang ston pa gang yin pa gsum po 'di 'don pa'i rim pa las tha mar gyur pa nyid kyi phyir tha
translated: This means that when the other gender is female gender, it is a fault for a knowing male to travel on the road together with a male or female, or to teach the doctrine to a female.🔽The three below are the basis of training for a nun, the basis of training for a male novice, and the basis of training for a male monk.

original: mar byung ba'o //
analyzed: mar byung ba'o //
translated: The last three are the basis of training for a nun, the basis of training for a male novice, and the basis of training for a male monk.

original: 'khrig pa kun nas smras pa dang / bsnyen bkur bsngags pa dang / ston pa rnams la legs par smras pa dang / nyes par smras pa dag la don kun shes pa dang / so sor stobs dang ldan pa nyid la bud med la dngos gzhi'i byed pa po nyid yin no //🔽gzhan du brjod pa'i gsum las 'dir reg pa dang dben pa'i gnas su stan la 'dug pa dang 'greng ba gnyis dang nyal po byed par shom pa dang bcas pa'i khyim du 'dug pa dang / 'greng ba gnyis dang lhan cig tu nyal ba dang rig pa'i skyes pa med par bud med dang lhan cig lam du 'gro ba la'o zhes bya ba 'dis 'khrig pa dgag pa'i phyir bsten par bya ba la mthu yod pa nyid la bud med dngos gzhi'i byed pa
analyzed: 'khrig pa kun nas smras pa dang / bsnyen bkur bsngags pa dang / ston pa rnams la legs par smras pa dang / nyes par smras pa dag la don kun shes pa dang / so sor stobs dang ldan pa nyid la bud med la dngos gzhi'i byed pa po nyid yin no // gzhan du brjod pa'i gsum las 'dir reg pa dang dben pa'i gnas su stan la 'dug pa dang 'greng ba gnyis dang nyal po byed par shom pa dang bcas pa'i khyim du 'dug pa dang / 'greng ba gnyis dang lhan cig tu nyal ba dang rig pa'i skyes pa med par bud med dang lhan cig lam du 'gro ba la'o zhes bya ba 'dis 'khrig pa dgag pa'i phyir bsten par bya ba la mthu yod pa nyid la bud med dngos gzhi'i byed pa
translated: The woman is the actual perpetrator of the act of sexual intercourse, praising the act of sexual intercourse, praising service, praising the teacher, praising the good and bad speech, understanding all the meanings, and being powerful in each.

original: po nyid do zhes bya ba 'dir ngag gi don to //
analyzed: po nyid do zhes bya ba 'dir ngag gi don to //
translated: The woman is the actual perpetrator

original: gzhan du na 'og ma'i 'o zhes bya ba ni mthu yod par ji ltar brjod pa'i don 'di la 'dir dben pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'og ma'i tshig la byed pa po nyid ni bud med do zhes gang zhig mthu dang ldan pa las dge
analyzed: gzhan du na 'og ma'i 'o zhes bya ba ni mthu yod par ji ltar brjod pa'i don 'di la 'dir dben pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'og ma'i tshig la byed pa po nyid ni bud med do zhes gang zhig mthu dang ldan pa las dge
translated: Otherwise, the meaning of “the lower” is how it is said to have power. Here, in the verse “the lower” is used for the agent, a woman.

original: 'dun lhag ma gang yin pa de la mthu med na nyes pa sbom po'o //
analyzed: 'dun lhag ma gang yin pa de la mthu med na nyes pa sbom po'o //
translated: If the remainder of the saṅgha has no power in this matter, it is a serious violation.

original: gang zhig nyes pa sbom po gang yin pa de ni mthu med na nyes byas so //
analyzed: gang zhig nyes pa sbom po gang yin pa de ni mthu med na nyes byas so //
translated: If the serious violation has no power, it is a minor infraction.

original: gang zhig mthu yod pa las ltung ba de ni mthu med pa la nyes byas te zhes bya ba 'di la 'di byed pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig mthu yod pa las ltung ba de ni mthu med pa la nyes byas te zhes bya ba 'di la 'di byed pa'o //
translated: If the downfall has power in this matter, it is a minor infraction if there is no power.

original: ma ning mo dang ma ning pho dang sprul pa mo la yang de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni mthu med pa bzhin du'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ma ning mo dang ma ning pho dang sprul pa mo la yang de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni mthu med pa bzhin du'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The same applies to a neuter woman, a neuter man, and an emanation woman, meaning that they are powerless.

original: gsum po 'di la skyes pa'o //
analyzed: gsum po 'di la skyes pa'o //
translated: In these three cases, it is a man.

original: zhes bya ba ni lus kyi reg pa dang / kun nas smra ba dang / bsnyen bkur bsngags pa rnams la skyes pa yang dag par gyur pa la sprul pa la mthu med pa ltar blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lus kyi reg pa dang / kun nas smra ba dang / bsnyen bkur bsngags pa rnams la skyes pa yang dag par gyur pa la sprul pa la mthu med pa ltar blta bar bya'o //

original: 'tsho 'am 'on te ma yin zhes yang dang yang du brtag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'jig pa dang mi 'jig pa'i don 'bad pas so sor brtag pa'o //
analyzed: 'tsho 'am 'on te ma yin zhes yang dang yang du brtag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'jig pa dang mi 'jig pa'i don 'bad pas so sor brtag pa'o //
translated: One should repeatedly examine whether or not she is alive means that one should carefully examine the meaning of destruction and non-destruction.

original: sems dag pas snying brtse bas bud med de la 'khyud pa la nyes pa med do zhes bya ba ni gang zhig sman gyi gzhi las bcom ldan 'das kyis bud med skra grol ba la 'khyud pa gnang ngo zhes 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: sems dag pas snying brtse bas bud med de la 'khyud pa la nyes pa med do zhes bya ba ni gang zhig sman gyi gzhi las bcom ldan 'das kyis bud med skra grol ba la 'khyud pa gnang ngo zhes 'byung ba ste /
translated: There is no fault in embracing that woman out of a pure mind and compassion means that in the Sutra on Medicine, the Blessed One permitted embracing a woman with loose hair.

original: de mdo 'dir bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: de mdo 'dir bsdus pa yin no //
translated: That is included in this sutra.

original: 'dir dge ba'i sems nyid tsam ni dag pa'i sems nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir dge ba'i sems nyid tsam ni dag pa'i sems nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: Here, merely the virtuous mind itself should be known as the pure mind.

original: 'dod chags dag dang bral ba'i sems nyid kho na ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dod chags dag dang bral ba'i sems nyid kho na ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not just the mind itself free from attachment.

original: dge 'dun gyi lhag pa gnyis pa'i rnam par 'byed pa'o /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi lhag pa gnyis pa'i rnam par 'byed pa'o /
translated: This concludes the analysis of the second class of offenses of the Sangha.

original: // / 'jam pa dang dro ba dang snyi ba'i bsam pa nyid na sbom po'o zhes bya ba ni 'jam pa yin nam 'on te ma yin snyam pa'i bsam pa nyi tshe bud med la nyams su myong ba la yin gyi /
analyzed: // / 'jam pa dang dro ba dang snyi ba'i bsam pa nyid na sbom po'o zhes bya ba ni 'jam pa yin nam 'on te ma yin snyam pa'i bsam pa nyi tshe bud med la nyams su myong ba la yin gyi /
translated: If he has the thought of softness, warmth, or tenderness, it is a serious offense.

original: reg pa rtse gcig pa nyid kyis 'khyud pa dang so so yang dag par ldan pa'i ro myang ba'i bsam pa nyid kyis ni ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: reg pa rtse gcig pa nyid kyis 'khyud pa dang so so yang dag par ldan pa'i ro myang ba'i bsam pa nyid kyis ni ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that he has the thought of softness, but not the thought of embracing with single-pointed contact and savoring the experience of union.

original: 'dir gzhung ni btsun pa re zhig dge 'dun gyis dro ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pas lus la reg par bgyid na ltung ba cir 'gyur /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni btsun pa re zhig dge 'dun gyis dro ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pas lus la reg par bgyid na ltung ba cir 'gyur /
translated: Here is the text: “Venerable, if a monk touches a woman with the thought of warmth, what is the offense?”

original: nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: “It is a serious offense.”

original: de bzhin du 'jam pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa dang / snyi ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'jam pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa dang / snyi ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Similarly, “if he has the thought of softness, or the thought of tenderness.”

original: kun du 'dod chags pa med par bud med dag gi lus la reg pa rnam pa lnga gsungs te de ni khyad par can gyi spyod pa dang / de dang 'dra ba dang / don med par reg pa kho na yin pa dang / rgod bag gis reg pa'i bye brag nyams su myong bar 'dod pa dang /
analyzed: kun du 'dod chags pa med par bud med dag gi lus la reg pa rnam pa lnga gsungs te de ni khyad par can gyi spyod pa dang / de dang 'dra ba dang / don med par reg pa kho na yin pa dang / rgod bag gis reg pa'i bye brag nyams su myong bar 'dod pa dang /
translated: Five types of contact with the body of a woman are taught when there is no complete attachment: that is, special conduct, conduct similar to that, contact for no purpose, contact through frivolity and contact through desire to experience a specific feeling.

original: mi 'dod par skye bo mang po ltos pa'i dus dag tu dbang med par reg pa gang yin pa rnams so //
analyzed: mi 'dod par skye bo mang po ltos pa'i dus dag tu dbang med par reg pa gang yin pa rnams so //
translated: There are five kinds of contact with the bodies of women when there is no lust: that which is special, that which is like the special, that which is contact with no purpose, that which is contact with a specific frivolity, and that which is contact with no desire but which occurs when there is a need to be in the presence of many people.

original: 'dir khyad par can gyi spyod pa ni rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: 'dir khyad par can gyi spyod pa ni rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: Here, the special conduct is of three kinds:

original: snying brtse ba dang nye du bshes pa mthong ba dang / sngon spyad pa la kun dga' ba nyams su myong ba'o //
analyzed: snying brtse ba dang nye du bshes pa mthong ba dang / sngon spyad pa la kun dga' ba nyams su myong ba'o //
translated: that which is out of compassion, that which is out of seeing a relative or friend, and that which is out of delight in past practice.

original: khyad par can gyi spyod pa dang 'dra ba ni gnas ma yin pa la snying brtse ba la sogs pa rnams la de'i ngo bas mi @115b 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: khyad par can gyi spyod pa dang 'dra ba ni gnas ma yin pa la snying brtse ba la sogs pa rnams la de'i ngo bas mi @115b 'jug pa'o //
translated: That which is like the special conduct is that which is not engaged in with the nature of the special conduct, such as compassion for an inappropriate object.

original: dper na 'gyel ba rang nyid sdangs par nus pa slong bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: dper na 'gyel ba rang nyid sdangs par nus pa slong bar byed pa'o //
translated: For example, it is like a frightened person who is able to be comforted by another.

original: rnam pa lnga po 'di rnams la zhu ba 'di rnams te /
analyzed: rnam pa lnga po 'di rnams la zhu ba 'di rnams te /
translated: These are the five kinds of situations in which there is no offense.

original: gang zhig 'dul byed dag las ltung ba dang ltung ba med pa rnams bsten pa'i phyir brjod do //
analyzed: gang zhig 'dul byed dag las ltung ba dang ltung ba med pa rnams bsten pa'i phyir brjod do //
translated: One should rely on the rules of training in order to avoid downfalls and to cultivate the absence of downfalls.🔽There is no offense if one touches a woman out of compassion in order to save her from harm.

original: snying brtse bas sdug bsngal las thar par bya ba la ni ltung ba med do zhes bya ba ni me dang g-yang sa dang mtshon dang gag mig dang / dug za ba dang sprul gyis sos btab pa dang stag dang 'dab chags dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa'i rgud pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi sdug bsngal las grol ba la reg pa gang yin pa de la ni ltung ba med do //
analyzed: snying brtse bas sdug bsngal las thar par bya ba la ni ltung ba med do zhes bya ba ni me dang g-yang sa dang mtshon dang gag mig dang / dug za ba dang sprul gyis sos btab pa dang stag dang 'dab chags dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa'i rgud pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi sdug bsngal las grol ba la reg pa gang yin pa de la ni ltung ba med do //
translated: There is no offense if one touches a woman in order to save her from the suffering of fire, a cliff, weapons, a pitfall, poison, a snake, a tiger, a bird, a non-human being, and so on.

original: ma dang bu mo dang sring mo rnams la de dag tu 'du shes pa'o zhes bya ba ni ma la sogs pa'i 'du shes de rnams yod par gyur pa las ma la sogs pa la reg pas ltung ba med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ma dang bu mo dang sring mo rnams la de dag tu 'du shes pa'o zhes bya ba ni ma la sogs pa'i 'du shes de rnams yod par gyur pa las ma la sogs pa la reg pas ltung ba med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: There is no offense if one touches a woman who is one’s mother, daughter, or sister, if one is not thinking of her as a woman.

original: sngon spyad pa nyid la kun dga' bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni kun dga' ba'i mtshan can gyi reg pa la ltung ba med ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sngon spyad pa nyid la kun dga' bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni kun dga' ba'i mtshan can gyi reg pa la ltung ba med ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The phrase one should delight in the past practice means that there is no offense in the contact that is called delight.

original: dge 'dun lhag ma gnyis pa'i zhu ba'i skabs so /
analyzed: dge 'dun lhag ma gnyis pa'i zhu ba'i skabs so /
translated: This is the section on the two remaining offenses entailing suspension.🔽If one engages the female organ with food, earth, clods of dirt, and so on, it is a serious violation.

original: // / zas dang sa dang bong ba la sogs pa mo'i dbang por 'jug na sbom po'o zhes bya ba ni 'di ni rnam par 'gyur bar gyur pa mi tshangs par spyod pa'i lam gyi rnam par nges par 'dir rgod bag ces bya ba kha na ma tho ba🔽dang bcas pa nyid do //
analyzed: // / zas dang sa dang bong ba la sogs pa mo'i dbang por 'jug na sbom po'o zhes bya ba ni 'di ni rnam par 'gyur bar gyur pa mi tshangs par spyod pa'i lam gyi rnam par nges par 'dir rgod bag ces bya ba kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa nyid do //
translated: This is the definitive classification of the path of sexual misconduct that has become manifest.🔽If one offers a woman one's feet, shoulders, and so on, it is an offense of wrong conduct.

original: rkang ba dang phrag pa la sogs pas bud med la phul na nyes byas so zhes bya ba la 'di ni shin tu ma khyab pa ste /
analyzed: rkang ba dang phrag pa la sogs pas bud med la phul na nyes byas so zhes bya ba la 'di ni shin tu ma khyab pa ste /
translated: This is not very extensive.

original: ji ltar sngar bstan pa zhes bya ba 'di shes pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar sngar bstan pa zhes bya ba 'di shes pa'o //
translated: One should understand just as it was taught before.

original: pus mo dang rje dar dang brla dang rked pa dang lag pa dang dpung pa dang mgo bo la sogs pa gcig pu rnams kho nar ma zad kyi sen mo la sogs pa rnams yang 'di snyegs par rig par bya'o //🔽de'i stan la yang ngo zhes bya ba ni bud med dang bcas pa 'am /
analyzed: pus mo dang rje dar dang brla dang rked pa dang lag pa dang dpung pa dang mgo bo la sogs pa gcig pu rnams kho nar ma zad kyi sen mo la sogs pa rnams yang 'di snyegs par rig par bya'o // de'i stan la yang ngo zhes bya ba ni bud med dang bcas pa 'am /
translated: Not only the knees, calves, thighs, waist, hands, arms, head, and so on, but also the nails and so on are to be understood as included.

original: bud med med pa'i bud med kyi sta na la rkang pa'i chu la sogs pas 'phul na nyes byas so //
analyzed: bud med med pa'i bud med kyi sta na la rkang pa'i chu la sogs pas 'phul na nyes byas so //
translated: Also on her seat means that if one pushes with one’s foot and so on the seat of a woman, whether she is present or not, one commits an offense of wrong conduct.

original: bud med dang bcas pa nyid kyis 'di rnams la bud med kyi snyan bsten pa 'don pa yin te /🔽'dir gzhung ni dge slong gis bud med dang bcas pa 'am /
analyzed: bud med dang bcas pa nyid kyis 'di rnams la bud med kyi snyan bsten pa 'don pa yin te / 'dir gzhung ni dge slong gis bud med dang bcas pa 'am /
translated: Because of the presence of a woman, these are called “the seats of women.”

original: bud med med pa'i stan la rkang pas bsgul na nyes byas so zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: bud med med pa'i stan la rkang pas bsgul na nyes byas so zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The text says, “If a monk moves with his foot the seat of a woman, whether she is present or not, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.”

original: bud med dang bcas pa nyid la ni 'dir nyes byas yin te /
analyzed: bud med dang bcas pa nyid la ni 'dir nyes byas yin te /
translated: Here, the offense of wrong conduct is due to the presence of a woman.

original: 'on kyang bud med la dga' bas 'di phul pa gcig pu nyid la yang nyes byas dang sbyor ba zhes bya ba 'di @116a * //
analyzed: 'on kyang bud med la dga' bas 'di phul pa gcig pu nyid la yang nyes byas dang sbyor ba zhes bya ba 'di @116a * //
translated: But because of his lust for women, he committed a single offense called “preparation.”

original: ltar mdo byas so //
analyzed: ltar mdo byas so //
translated: Thus, the Sutra was composed in this way.

original: 'dred pas 'gyel ba'i bud med slong ba'o zhes bya ba ni 'dred pas 'gyel ba'i bud med slong na nyes byas so //
analyzed: 'dred pas 'gyel ba'i bud med slong ba'o zhes bya ba ni 'dred pas 'gyel ba'i bud med slong na nyes byas so //
translated: “Raising a woman who has fallen down because of a stumble” means that if one raises a woman who has fallen down because of a stumble, there is an offense of wrong conduct.

original: 'di ni nyam nga bar gyur pas 'gyel ba ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni nyam nga bar gyur pas 'gyel ba ma yin no //
translated: This is not a case of falling down because of a dangerous situation.

original: de bas na legs par ma byas pa nyid kyis 'jug pa 'di yid la nges par 'brel ba yin gyi snying rje'i dngos po rgyu mthun pa nyid kyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na legs par ma byas pa nyid kyis 'jug pa 'di yid la nges par 'brel ba yin gyi snying rje'i dngos po rgyu mthun pa nyid kyis ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, this engagement is definitely connected with the mind because of improper action, and not because of the natural outflow of compassion.

original: de bas na 'dir ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na 'dir ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa'o //
translated: Therefore, this is established as a downfall here.

original: nyes byas la snying brtse ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir sbom po'i ltung ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: nyes byas la snying brtse ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir sbom po'i ltung ba ni ma yin no //
translated: Because of the nature of compassion, it is not a serious downfall.

original: bud med kyis de gsum byed pa la ni ltung ba med do zhes bya ba ni rkang pa'i cha la sogs pas dge slong 'phul ba dang / dge slong gi stan la 'phul ba dang / 'dred pas 'gyel ba slong ba zhes bya ba gsum po 'di bud med kyis byas pa la ltung ba med do //
analyzed: bud med kyis de gsum byed pa la ni ltung ba med do zhes bya ba ni rkang pa'i cha la sogs pas dge slong 'phul ba dang / dge slong gi stan la 'phul ba dang / 'dred pas 'gyel ba slong ba zhes bya ba gsum po 'di bud med kyis byas pa la ltung ba med do //
translated: There is no offense for a woman to do these three things: to push a monk with her foot, to push a monk with her seat, and to help a monk who has fallen down and is confused.

original: mi 'dod bzhin du 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir 'di dang 'chad par 'gyur ba la skyon med pa nyid do //🔽bzung ba la yang ngo zhes bya ba ni dge slong mi 'dod bzhin du bud med kyis bzung ba la yang ltung ba med do //
analyzed: mi 'dod bzhin du 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir 'di dang 'chad par 'gyur ba la skyon med pa nyid do // bzung ba la yang ngo zhes bya ba ni dge slong mi 'dod bzhin du bud med kyis bzung ba la yang ltung ba med do //
translated: There is no offense for a monk to do these three things, because they occur without his wanting them to, and because he is without fault, as will be explained.🔽There is no offense for a monk to be seized by a woman without his wanting it.

original: mas 'khyud pa la yang ngo //🔽pang par bu mo 'dug pa la yang ngo zhes bya ba ni ltung ba med do zhes bya bar sbyor ro //
analyzed: mas 'khyud pa la yang ngo // pang par bu mo 'dug pa la yang ngo zhes bya ba ni ltung ba med do zhes bya bar sbyor ro //
translated: There is no offense for a monk to be embraced by his mother.🔽There is no offense for a monk to sit in the lap of his daughter.

original: bud med 'khrul ba steng du 'gyel ba yang ngo zhes bya ba ni ltung ba med do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: bud med 'khrul ba steng du 'gyel ba yang ngo zhes bya ba ni ltung ba med do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: There is no offense for a monk to sit on a woman who has fallen on top of him and is confused.

original: dge 'dun lhag ma gnyis pa'i 'dul byed kyi skabs so /
analyzed: dge 'dun lhag ma gnyis pa'i 'dul byed kyi skabs so /
translated: This is the section on the vinaya rule for the second offense entailing suspension.

original: // / lus kyis reg pa'i dge 'dun lhag ma'o //
analyzed: // / lus kyis reg pa'i dge 'dun lhag ma'o //
translated: The offense entailing suspension for physical contact.

original: gang zhig smras na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gang zhig smras na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What is it that, if spoken, becomes an offense entailing suspension?

original: de'i phyir 'khrig pa smras na'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'khrig pa smras na'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore it is said, “If one speaks of sexual intercourse.”

original: bud med mthu yod pa la kun nas chags pas zhes bya ba 'di sngar brjod pa rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: bud med mthu yod pa la kun nas chags pas zhes bya ba 'di sngar brjod pa rtogs par bya'o //
translated: The phrase “with a woman who is capable” should be understood as stated previously.

original: slar yang 'khrig pa ni gnyis kyis gnyis sprod pa ste de smras na'o //
analyzed: slar yang 'khrig pa ni gnyis kyis gnyis sprod pa ste de smras na'o //
translated: “Sexual intercourse” means the joining of two with two.

original: sgra ji lta bus de brjod pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: sgra ji lta bus de brjod pa gang zhe na /
translated: In what words is that spoken?

original: de'i phyir rgya la sogs pa'i don gyis so zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rgya la sogs pa'i don gyis so zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore it is said, “By the meaning of ‘seal’ and so on.”

original: 'dir rgya la sogs pa'i sgra ni ya yig dang bha yig gi rang bzhin zhes bya ba brjod pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir rgya la sogs pa'i sgra ni ya yig dang bha yig gi rang bzhin zhes bya ba brjod pa'o //
translated: Here the term “seal” and so on is said to be of the nature of the letters ya and bha.

original: de'i don can rgya la sogs pa rnam pa gzhan gyis 'khrig pa brjod pa gang yin par ston pa de ni rgya la sogs pa zhes bya ba grags pa nye bar song ba'o //
analyzed: de'i don can rgya la sogs pa rnam pa gzhan gyis 'khrig pa brjod pa gang yin par ston pa de ni rgya la sogs pa zhes bya ba grags pa nye bar song ba'o //
translated: The meaning of that is the expression of sexual intercourse by other forms, such as the seal, etc.

original: rgya'i don ni mthong bar rig par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rgya'i don ni mthong bar rig par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: The meaning of the seal is not to be known by seeing.

original: de ltar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag dang lhan cig bud par gyis shig ces bya ba de la nyes pa sbom por gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag dang lhan cig bud par gyis shig ces bya ba de la nyes pa sbom por gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the Blessed One has declared that the statement, “Make love with me,” is a grave offense.

original: @116b bye brag ma byas pa'i sgra la yang brjod par 'dod pa'i dbang gis khyad par du gzhag pa ste /
analyzed: @116b bye brag ma byas pa'i sgra la yang brjod par 'dod pa'i dbang gis khyad par du gzhag pa ste /
translated: Even with a word that is not specific, one can establish a distinction by the power of what one wishes to express.

original: de bas na bdag nyid kyis brjod par 'dod pa gsal bar byed pa'i sgra med kyang rang gis brjod par 'dod pas sbyor bar rtogs pa la de'i brjod par 'dod pa nyid la gzhan gyi dngos gzhi bskyed par rig par bya'o ;
analyzed: de bas na bdag nyid kyis brjod par 'dod pa gsal bar byed pa'i sgra med kyang rang gis brjod par 'dod pas sbyor bar rtogs pa la de'i brjod par 'dod pa nyid la gzhan gyi dngos gzhi bskyed par rig par bya'o ;
translated: Therefore, even without a word that clarifies what one wishes to express, one should understand that one’s own expression is generated by the basis of another’s wish to express.

original: / ya yig bha yig la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i sgra la brjod par 'dod pa la yin te /
analyzed: / ya yig bha yig la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i sgra la brjod par 'dod pa la yin te /
translated: It is the case when one wishes to express any sound, such as the syllables ya, ra, la, va, etc.

original: bud med la gnas pa'i bdag nyid brjod par 'dod pas thos su bcug pa tsam la nyes byas ni yin no //
analyzed: bud med la gnas pa'i bdag nyid brjod par 'dod pas thos su bcug pa tsam la nyes byas ni yin no //
translated: When one who is a woman wishes to express herself, and merely makes herself heard, there is an offense of wrong conduct.

original: 'dir bya ba'i tshig ni dgongs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir bya ba'i tshig ni dgongs pa ma yin no //
translated: Here, the verbal action is not intended.

original: bdag nyid du rnam par rig par bya ba dag la mtshams nye bar sbyor bas khas len pa'i ngo bos ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bdag nyid du rnam par rig par bya ba dag la mtshams nye bar sbyor bas khas len pa'i ngo bos ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not by the form of accepting through connecting with the limit of what is to be cognized as oneself.

original: 'gro ba brjod pa nyid la 'dir skyon nyid bstan pas don gyis bsnyen pa rtsom par gyur pa nyid la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'gro ba brjod pa nyid la 'dir skyon nyid bstan pas don gyis bsnyen pa rtsom par gyur pa nyid la ni ma yin no //
translated: Here, the fault itself is taught in the very expression of going, so it is not by undertaking the approach in meaning.

original: 'dir rang gi 'dod pa nyid smra ba yod pas gyur pa yang gzhan gyis ma shes pa la sbom po'o zhes bya ba 'di shes pa'i don du nges pa'i mdo 'di las rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir rang gi 'dod pa nyid smra ba yod pas gyur pa yang gzhan gyis ma shes pa la sbom po'o zhes bya ba 'di shes pa'i don du nges pa'i mdo 'di las rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Here, since one's own desire is spoken of, the offense of wrongdoing is when the other does not understand. This should be understood from this definitive sūtra for the sake of understanding.

original: rang gi smra bar gyur pa nyid med pa la sbom po nyid ni rang gi don nyid do //
analyzed: rang gi smra bar gyur pa nyid med pa la sbom po nyid ni rang gi don nyid do //
translated: The offense of wrongdoing is for one's own purpose when there is no expression of one's own.

original: de ni de'i gtso bo zhes bya ba 'di las so //
analyzed: de ni de'i gtso bo zhes bya ba 'di las so //
translated: That is called its principal one.🔽That which is to be understood is the limit of verbal expression.

original: gang la go bar bya ba nyid de brda phrad pa ni mtha'o zhes bya ba ni 'dir brda phrad pa ni brjod par 'dod pa'i don yongs su thob pa'o //
analyzed: gang la go bar bya ba nyid de brda phrad pa ni mtha'o zhes bya ba ni 'dir brda phrad pa ni brjod par 'dod pa'i don yongs su thob pa'o //
translated: Here, verbal expression is the attainment of the meaning that is desired to be expressed.

original: brjod par 'dod pa'i don yongs su thob par byed pa'i don can gyi lus dang ngag phrad par byed pa'i bdag nyid can thams cad la don gcig la rtsom par gyur pa nyid kyi phyir skad cig ma gcig tu gyur pa'o //
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pa'i don yongs su thob par byed pa'i don can gyi lus dang ngag phrad par byed pa'i bdag nyid can thams cad la don gcig la rtsom par gyur pa nyid kyi phyir skad cig ma gcig tu gyur pa'o //
translated: The body and speech that have the meaning of causing the attainment of the meaning that is desired to be expressed are united. Since they all have the nature of beginning in one meaning, they become one moment.

original: 'dir ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa med par gyur pa nyid de mtha' dang mtha' med pa'i dbye ba ji tsam du byas pa la dngos gzhi'i ltung ba bskyed pa ste zhes bya ba 'di la mdo 'di'o //
analyzed: 'dir ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa med par gyur pa nyid de mtha' dang mtha' med pa'i dbye ba ji tsam du byas pa la dngos gzhi'i ltung ba bskyed pa ste zhes bya ba 'di la mdo 'di'o //
translated: Here, the non-existence of the establishment of downfalls is just the division of the limit and the limitless. As much as is done, the basic downfall is generated. This is the meaning of this sutra.

original: tshig la sogs pa'i mtha' ni mtha' zhes bya ba 'di rnam par gzhag pa ma yin te /
analyzed: tshig la sogs pa'i mtha' ni mtha' zhes bya ba 'di rnam par gzhag pa ma yin te /
translated: The limit of words and so on is not established as the limit.

original: 'on kyang mtha' las byung ba 'am mtha' ma yin pa gang yin pa gang zhig la yi ge la sogs pa gang zhig la gzhan gyi shes par rung ba nyid brjod par 'dod pa'i don shes pa las snod du rung ba nyid du gyur pa la rtog pa
analyzed: 'on kyang mtha' las byung ba 'am mtha' ma yin pa gang yin pa gang zhig la yi ge la sogs pa gang zhig la gzhan gyi shes par rung ba nyid brjod par 'dod pa'i don shes pa las snod du rung ba nyid du gyur pa la rtog pa
translated: But the end is that which arises from the end, or is the end.🔽The proof of that is the ear consciousness or eye consciousness that is suitable to understand the meaning that is desired to be expressed, which is suitable to be the object of the consciousness of another.

original: po la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'am mig gi rnam par shes pa la bsgrub pa gang yin pa de ni 'dir mtha'o //
analyzed: po la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'am mig gi rnam par shes pa la bsgrub pa gang yin pa de ni 'dir mtha'o //

analyzed: de bas na der dngos gzhi'o // de'i 'og tu rtsom pa gcig tu gyur pa'i phyir de @117a * //

original: nyid du zhugs ba'o //
analyzed: nyid du zhugs ba'o //

analyzed: gal te yi ge dang po shes pa'i dus na yang de la dngos gzhi'i zhes bya ba rig bar bya ste /
